benefits.1: Custom development tailored to your existing systems and compliance needs
benefits.2: Deploy on your preferred cloud infrastructure or on-premises environment

citizenEngagement.title: WhatsApp Business Integration

benefits.1: WhatsApp Business API integration with your existing municipal systems
benefits.2: Deploy on your chosen cloud provider with complete data sovereignty
benefits.3: Custom automation workflows connecting WhatsApp to your databases

complianceReporting.title: Compliance Automation Systems
complianceReporting.description: Custom compliance and reporting solutions built for Israeli regulatory requirements. Deploy on secure infrastructure with complete team training.

benefits.1: Automated generation of state-required documents and regulatory reports
benefits.2: Built-in Israeli compliance workflows and deadline management systems
benefits.3: Comprehensive team training and handover with full system ownership

bottomCta.text: Ready to discuss a custom automation solution for your organization?

hardcoded.watchDemo: Watch how we transform your workflows

features.title: Your Excel Hell, Solved
features.subtitle: Stop copying and pasting. Start automating the work that eats your day.

card1.title: Turn Excel Chaos into One-Click Reports
card1.description: Transform weekly reporting from a multi-day process to a single click. Pull data from all departments, format it perfectly, and send it out — automatically.

card2.title: Stop Manual Data Entry Forever
card2.description: Automated data extraction from documents and forms eliminates manual copying from PDFs to spreadsheets. Your databases update instantly.

card3.title: Never Miss Compliance Deadlines
card3.description: Automatic alerts for regulatory reports. Generate state-required documents with current data. No scrambling at month-end.

card4.title: Enable 24/7 Citizen Services via WhatsApp
card4.description: Citizens can check permit status, submit requests, pay fees, and receive updates through WhatsApp and web portals. Automated responses handle common inquiries instantly.

card5.title: Connect Your Scattered Systems
card5.description: Finance uses one system, Planning uses another, HR has three. We make them talk to each other. One source of truth.

card6.title: Your Team Actually Uses It
card6.description: No IT degree required. If they can use email, they can use this. We train everyone and stay until they're comfortable.

whatsapp.title: Meet Citizens Where They Are - WhatsApp
whatsapp.subtitle: Enable residents to access municipal services 24/7 through their preferred communication channel

status.title: Check Status Instantly
status.description: Permit applications, license renewals, and service request updates delivered automatically

requests.title: Submit Service Requests
requests.description: Report issues, request services, and file complaints with photo attachments and location data

updates.title: Receive Automated Notifications
updates.description: Payment reminders, deadline alerts, and important municipal announcements

access.title: 24/7 Information Access
access.description: Office hours, contact information, forms, and frequently asked questions available anytime

integration.title: Seamlessly Integrated with Your Municipal Systems
integration.description: WhatsApp communications sync directly with your existing databases and workflows

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Operations?
cta.subtitle: 30 minutes to assess your workflows and design your custom automation solution
cta.testimonial: Custom automation solution deployed on our infrastructure transformed our monthly reporting from a multi-day process to automated delivery. Full ownership, no ongoing fees.
cta.author: Municipal Finance Department

trustIndicators.testimonial: Synqer transformed our monthly reporting from a 3-day nightmare to a 30-minute task. Our staff can finally focus on serving citizens instead of fighting with spreadsheets.
trustIndicators.clientBase: Building solutions for organizations across Israel including Major Institutions and Regional Authorities

footer.tagline: Custom Automation Solutions for Government Organizations

contact.title: Let's Talk
contact.subtitle: Schedule a discovery call to assess your workflows and design a tailored solution for your infrastructure

projectTime.question: How long does a typical project take?
projectTime.answer: Most automation projects take 4-8 weeks, depending on complexity and integration requirements.

smallTeams.question: Do you work with small teams?
smallTeams.answer: Absolutely! We work with organizations of all sizes, from small municipalities to large enterprises.

ongoingSupport.question: What if we need ongoing support?
ongoingSupport.answer: We offer flexible support packages and can work with you on a retainer basis for ongoing projects.

existingTools.question: Can you work with our existing tools?
existingTools.answer: Yes! We specialize in integrating with your current workflow and tools rather than replacing them.

about.title: About Synqer.ai
about.subtitle: We specialize in smart automation solutions that transform municipal operations and significantly reduce manual work.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: At Synqer.ai, we believe automation should solve real municipal problems, not create new complexities. We build smart systems that transform outdated processes into efficient, automated operations.
mission.description2: Our approach is hands-on, practical, and focused on delivering systems that your team can actually use and maintain.

points.1: Automation that focuses on real problems
points.2: Focus on solutions your teams will adopt
points.3: Experience with government and municipal workflows
points.4: Systems built for growth and change
